description: This file is a shell script used for managing OCI containers via curl commands interacting with a backend service. It contains functions to start, stop, list, get info, pause, resume, and execute commands within containers, along with a command-line interface loop.

methods.name: start_container_from_bundle
methods.description: Starts an OCI container from a bundle directory or tarball.

methods.name: start_container_from_spec
methods.description: Starts an OCI container using a Dobby JSON specification.

methods.name: get_container_info
methods.description: Retrieves information about a specific container.

methods.name: get_container_state
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of a container.

methods.name: execute_command
methods.description: Executes a command inside a container, with optional parameters.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main function that handles user input and calls command functions.
